entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cant have ApplicationDisplayVersion Conditionally in Maui Projects #25619
  • Blazor Maui touch events overload make UI unresponsive during many touch events during heavy workload. #25612
  • [Testing] Add AllLists Sample to Manual Testing to validate performance expectations #25609
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Binding context type check fails for relative binding sources #25608
    .NET 9 SR1
  • MAUI ios application build fails with clang error code 137 #25607
  • Empty View Overlapping Header in CollectionView with CollectionViewHandler2 in .Net9 #25606
    Backlog
  • MacCatalyst ToolTips are inconsistent, and do not update. #25604
  • Blank target links no longer works on iOS 18 in BlazorWebView #25602
  • OnNavigating wrong target when tapping the same tab #25599
  • IndicatorView with Template wont show when ItemSource reaches 0 Elements #25598
  • Navigation freeze the UI when clicking the [Back] button. #25597

Closed

  • Filter "Remarks" from Maui properties Intellisense #25220
    .NET 9 SR1
  • 8.0.82 to 8.0.90 causes slow down on iOS #25578
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Visual Studio 17.11.5 causes Windows MAUI to break build #25160
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [MAUI]Go to 'My Recipes' page throw exception"Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory " #25002
    .NET 9 SR1
  • .NET 9 GA Reviewing Localization PRs for Backporting #25328
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Update CV2 on NET9.0 GA #25325
    .NET 9 SR1
  • I don't see the curly bars in the status bar #25594
  • TableView TextCell command executes only once #21112
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Write UI Test for https://github.com/dotnet/maui/pull/25453 #25504
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [Mac Catalyst] Allow to set window coordinates and size #25603
  • [MAUI][iOS18.0][macOS15.0] I6 & I9 - Clicking on some pages will throw an exception. #24838
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Localization tests #25620
    area-testing, area-localization
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update some versions for ga #25616
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Try skip provisionator #25615
  • Revert PR #23052 behavior under new app context switch #25613
    do-not-merge, .NET 8 SR9.3
  • [Testing] Implement ScrollDownTo and ScrollUpTo methods in Appium #25601
    area-testing
  • [X] Delay binding context type check until relative binding source is resolved #25600
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Fix for OnAppearing of Page called again, although this page was on already replaced NavigationStack #25596
    community ✨

Merged

  • Bump ASPNet Versions #25610
    .NET 8 SR9.3
  • [ci] Skip provisioning extra #25605
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR1
  • Remove all To be added. from API docs #25595
    area-docs
  • Fix Button Regression with null image source (#25485) #25611
    t/bug, area-controls-button, .NET 8 SR9.3
  • [Windows] Fixed TextCell Command executes only once #25066
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Testing] Written UI test for the issue resolved in PR 25453 #25573
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx] LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241029212245301 to net9.0 #25593
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241029171919460 to net9.0 #25584
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241029171919460 to net9.0 #25579
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241029212245301 to net9.0 #25590
  • [Testing] Added UITests method overrides allowing the use queries #25559
    area-testing
  • [release/9.0.1xx] bump net8 maui #25592

Updated

  • [main] Merge release 9.0.1xx to main #25589
  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140
    do-not-merge, .NET 8 SR10
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Prevent the tap that closes an open SwipeView from being propagated to children #24275
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR1
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR1
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fix and verify shadow / shape / clip #24941
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fix SafeArea adjustments #25315
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Implement ContextMenu UITest extension methods #25340
    area-testing
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] More Appium actions #25569
    area-testing
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix [Android]Text Clipping Issue in Entry with Long Strings #25554
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • [iOS] ScrollView's Gradient Background fix #25541
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Page.IsBusy activity indicators gets stuck/causes multiple to be displayed #23745
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [android] Fallback to default icons in SearchHandler #25067
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #2 #25378
    area-testing
  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes (batching version) #24823
    community ✨, t/perf
